Class ListsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • listsManagementClasses.ListsManager

  • public class ListsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines the type of object that manages the different lists being managed by the system for the lab session

    pedroirivera-vega

        public int getListIndex(java.lang.String name)
